page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our area lies 25 kilometers North-West of London.It is served both by the M1 motorway and rail-B.R. and the Underground . {Bushey Heath,}standing on a hill,and once well known for its healthy air and fine views,is now a respectable residential area.Halfway down the hill,{Bushey Village}retains some of the 'old world'charm it had when Herkomer and his school of painters lived here. Across farmland to the South-West lies {Carpenders Park},a post world war two residential estate. Nearby{Watford},with its impressive shopping centre and first division football team,attracts people from a wide area.
